description:
Akagane is http://anidb.net/ch10368 [Asagi]`s bodyguard. In the anime, http://anidb.net/ch1806 [Natsume] calls him Janome-san when he refuses to reveal his actual name.
(Janomegasa are a type of traditional umbrella. Janome alone however simply means one-eyed.)
Source: Natsume Yuujinchou Wiki
name: Akagane
